target.description: Deploys the System Framework Configuration ${application.release}

echo.message: 0100 System Framework Configuration ${application.release}
Deploying files for environment ${fmw.env} on ${oim.server.host}:${oim.server.port}
Deleting previously deployed metadata descriptors for ${fmw.env} from ${oim.server.host}:${oim.server.port}
Configure system property required in ${oim.server.host}:${oim.server.port}

systemproperty.name: BKA.Mail.Head
systemproperty.value: <head><meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"/><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"><style type="text/css">body{font-family:Arial;width:640px;height:2rem}#content{color:#000;background-color:#fff;padding-left:3rem;padding-right:3rem}#header{color:#fff;background-color:#036;padding-left:3rem;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:2rem;vertical-align:middle}#footer{color:#000;background-color:#fff;padding-left:3rem;font-size:.75rem;line-height:1rem;vertical-align:middle}hr{color:#036}h1.section,h2.section,h3.section,h4.section{color:#000;background-color:#fff;padding-bottom:.25rem;border-bottom:2px solid #036}h1.section{font-size:1.75rem;font-weight:700;line-height:2rem}h2.section{font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.5rem}h3.section{font-size:1.25rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.25rem}h4.section{font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;font-style:italic;line-height:1rem}div.table{width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;display:table}div.th{color:#fff;background-color:#036;display:table-row}div.tr{display:table-row}div.td{padding-top:.5rem;padding-left:1rem;padding-right:1rem;padding-bottom:.5rem;display:table-cell}</style></head>

systemproperty.name: BKA.Mail.Header
systemproperty.value: Identity & Access Management Team

systemproperty.name: BKA.Mail.Footer
systemproperty.value:
Bundeskriminalamt

This email is intended for %s

echo.message: Deploying importable objects for environment ${fmw.env} on ${oim.server.host}:${oim.server.port}
0100 completed
